assessment_item.title: ಭಾರತದ ಮೊದಲ ಸೌರ ವಿದ್ಯುತ್ ಉತ್ಪಾದನಾ ಕೇಂದ್ರ
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಭಾರತದ ಮೊದಲ ಸೌರ ವಿದ್ಯುತ್ ಉತ್ಪಾದನಾ ಕೇಂದ್ರ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ರಾಜಾಸ್ಥಾನದ ‘ಬಾರಾಮಾರ್’ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:6850"},{"text":"

ಮಹಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರದ ಬಾಂಬೆಹೈ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6851"},{"text":"

ತಮಿಳುನಾಡಿನ ‘ಕಲ್ಪಕಂ'  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6861"},{"text":"

ಕರ್ನಾಟಕದ ರಾಯಚೂರು
